We are about to generate your very own p: Kami ay bubuo ng iyong sariling passphrase
This keeps your account secure, and lets: Ito ang magpapanatili na secure ang iyong account, at magbibigay-paraan na buksan ang iyong wallet sa iba't-ibang aparato.
Ang iyong passphrase ay hindi na maipapakita uli.
Without it you will lose access to your: Kung wala ito, mawawala ang iyong access sa iyong wallet
I have written down or otherwise securel: Naisulat ko na at tinagong mabuti ang aking passphrase
Set a PIN for quick access: Mag-set ng PIN para sa mabilis na access
PIN must be a 4-digit number: Ang PIN ay kinakailangang maging 4- digit na numero
maari lamang na maging matiyaga sa pag-antay.
Your PIN is incorrect: Ang iyong PIN ay hindi tama
Request timeout. Please check your inter: Request timeout. Maari lamang na i-check ang koneksyon ng iyong internet.
Could not save your details: Hindi mai-save ang iyong mga detalye
We could not connect you to Mecto, pleas: Hindi namin ikaw maikunekta sa Mecto, maari lamang na i-check ang kuneksyon ng iyong internet.
Please enter a valid address to send to: Maari lamang na i-enter ang wastong address na papadalhan
Please enter an amount above: Mangyari lamang na i-enter ang halagang mas tataas sa %(dust)s
Ang ilang pondo ay pansamantalang hindi magagamit. Upang magpadala ng transaksyon, kinakailangan mong mag-antay muna para sa pagkumpirma ng iyong transaksyon na pending.
It seems like you are trying to empty yo: Mukhang nais mong limasin ang iyong wallet. Kung bibigyang-halaga ang transaction fee, tinatantya namin na ang max amount na maari mong maipadala ay %(sendableBalance)s. Na-amendya na namin ang halaga sa amount field para sa iyo.
You do not have enough funds in your wal: Wala kang sapat na pondo sa iyong wallet (incl. fee)
A name is required to set your profile o: Kinakailangan ng pangalan upang mai-set ang iyong profile sa Coin
Your browser does not support geolocatio: Ang iyong browser ay hindi sumusuporta ng geolocation
Unable to retrieve your location: Hindi nagawang makuha ang iyong lokasyon
Without a name, the payer would not be a: Kapag walang pangalan, ang magbabayad ay hindi makikilala ka sa Mecto.
Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is: Ang Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) ay isang serbisyo na naglalayong gamitin uli ang parehas na avatar sa mga website at app sa pamamagitan ng pagtukoy ng email address.
Mecto lets you broadcast your wallet add: Ang Mecto ay nagpapahintulot sa iyong wallet address na i-broadcast ito sa kalapit na mga gumagamit ng Coin sa pamamagitan ng pagkumpara ng GPS data. Ang data na ito ay mabubura kapag pinatay ang Mecto off.
Before you start using Mecto, you need t: Bago mo simulan ang paggamit ng Mecto, kinakailangan mong mag-enter ng pangalan na tutulong sa iba sa pagkakilala sa iyo.
You do not have any transactions yet: Wala ka pang mga transaksyon pa
No Coin users found nearby: Walang mga Coin user na mahanap na malapit
Searching your area for other Coin users: Maghanap sa iyong lugar para sa ibang Coin user
Your transaction will appear in your his: Ang iyong transaksyon ay makikita sa iyong tab ng kasaysayan nang ilang sandali.
Patawad, ang Coin Wallet ay hindi na-load.
Try updating your browser, or switching: Subukang i-update ang iyong browser, o lumabas sa private browsing mode. Kung lahat ay bigo, i-download ang Chrome sa iyong aparato.
I Agree To The Terms & Conditions: I Agree To The Terms & Conditions
Send up to :depositMax :depositSymbol to:
Send up to %(depositMax)s %(depositSymbol)s to deposit address.
It will be converted into %(toSymbol)s, and sent to
 %(toAddress)s
Please enter a valid return address: Please enter a valid return address
Return address should be an address cont: Return address should be an address controlled by you where deposit will be returned in the event of a failed transaction.
This page will be reloaded shortly.
This will transfer all coins from the pa: This will transfer all coins from the paper wallet address to your wallet.
This private key has no coins for transf: This private key has no coins for transfer.
Your private keys are keys to your funds: Your private keys are keys to your funds so DO NOT SHARE them with anyone unless you'd like them to have access to your funds.
Your wallet has no private keys with coi: Your wallet has no private keys with coins for export.
Gas limit is the amount of gas to send w: Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction. Increasing this number will not get your transaction confirmed faster. Sending ETH is equal 21000. Sending Tokens is equal around 200000.
Please enter Gas Limit greater than zero: Please enter Gas Limit above zero
You do not have enough Ethereum funds to: You do not have enough Ethereum funds to pay transaction fee (%(ethereumRequired)s ETH).
Please enter an address other than your: Please enter an address other than your wallet address
Please enter a private key other than yo: Please enter a private key other than your wallet private key
It seems like you are trying to empty yo: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee and minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s) into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
Your wallet isn't activated. To activate: Your wallet isn't activated. To activate it please send greater than minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s) to your wallet address.
Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You: Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You can send only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.
An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer tha: An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer that identifies a reason for payment or a non-Ripple account.
A 256-bit hash that can be used to ident: A 256-bit hash that can be used to identify a particular payment.
Please enter a valid invoice ID: Please enter a valid invoice ID
Please enter a valid destination tag: Please enter a valid destination tag
Exchange is currently unavailable for th: Exchange is currently unavailable for this pair
The memo contains optional extra informa: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 28-bytes long.
Your wallet isn't activated. You can rec: Your wallet isn't activated. You can receive only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.
Your ShapeShift account is not verified.
The EOS account name must be exactly 12-: The EOS account name must be exactly 12-character long and consist of lower case letters and digits from 1 to 5.
This account name is already taken, plea: This account name is already taken, please choose another one.
To create a new account you need to make: To create a new account you need to make an EOS transfer (amount greater than %(minAmount)s) with the following data from an exchange or other EOS wallet.
Account has been successfully set up: Account has been successfully set up
The memo contains optional extra informa: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 256-bytes long.
It seems like you are trying to empty yo: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
Transaction has been expired. Please try: Transaction has been expired. Please try again.
Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Ple: Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more CPU.
Account NET usage has been exceeded. Ple: Account NET usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more NET.
The extra amount will be deposited to th: The extra amount will be deposited to the created account.
Can't connect to :network node. Please t: Can't connect to %(network)s node. Please try again later or choose another token.
Network node error. Please try again lat: %(network)s node error. Please try again later.
Send :depositAmount :depositSymbol to de:
Send %(depositAmount)s %(depositSymbol)s to deposit address.
It will be converted into %(toSymbol)s, and sent to
 %(toAddress)s
You have 36 hours to send funds otherwis: You have 36 hours to send funds otherwise the transaction will be cancelled automatically.
Property for addresses of currencies tha: Property for addresses of currencies that use additional ID for transaction processing (e.g., destination tag, memo or message).
Network fee is fixed and taken each time: Network fee is fixed and taken each time wherever money is sent. Each currency has a strict amount taken for operations. This fee is taken once your funds are included in a blockchain.
Currently, your transaction (ID: :id) is:
Currently, your transaction (ID: %(id)s) is on hold.
Please, contact Changelly to pass KYC.
Transaction (ID: :id) has failed. Please: Transaction (ID: %(id)s) has failed. Please, contact Changelly.
Exchange failed and coins were refunded: Exchange failed and coins were refunded to %(address)s.
Payment wasn't received since 36 hours s: Payment wasn't received since 36 hours since the transaction was created.

I have read and I agree to the Changelly terms of use and privacy policy.
By clicking "Accept", I acknowledge and understan that my transaction may trigger AML/KYC verification according to Changelly AML/KYC.
Amount of coins that is charged from you: Amount of coins that is charged from your balance for single transaction (more info).
